name: XRP Bull Case Strengthens as ETFs, Treasury Adoption, and On-Chain Utility Converge
description: The chrome saint enacts the Binding Ritual, channeling iridescent cyan liquidity from fragmented vessels into the sweating brass conduit. Amid the dying AI cathedral, tungsten god-rays consecrate the structural flow. Utility is confirmed; the sacred noise of convergence shatters the speculative void.
